entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
